articles.content: Kidney cancer is a rare illness among children as it only makes up 7 percent of all childhood cancers. Among the subtypes of kidney cancer in children, Wilms tumour is the most prevalent form. These … [+5208 chars]

articles.title: Why sunscreen is still the best protection against skin cancer - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Skin cancer cases are increasing as we live longer. Melanoma is the deadliest kind, but is largely preventable with the right precautions, starting with the use of sunscreen. Experts explain which types to use.
